name: Barbell Ab Rollout
how_to_perform:
# Barbell Ab Rollout \n \n 1. Position yourself on the ground with your hands holding a barbell and your body forming a straight line from head to heels. Your feet should be shoulder-width apart, facing away from the barbell.


deep \nsix inches above the ground and the rest of it \npadded is recommended.

2. Engage your core by pulling your belly button towards your spine.

3. Slowly roll out along the ground towards the end of the barbell while keeping your arms straight, maintaining a tight upper body alignment throughout the movement.

4. Control to find the bottom when your chest touches the ground with your arms still locked in extension.

5. Then lift back into the starting position while pulling your belly button further through your spine as you extend towards full length once again.

6. Avoid using your lower back during the exercise as you roll out or push the barbell closer to the rest of your body since this will put your upper back at a significant disadvantage and could cause long term injuries to happen, \nsome people make it worse than others.
Repeat for desired repetitions.
short_summary: The Barbell Ab Rollout is an core exercise that uses a weight or resistance band as you roll out along the ground while engaging your muscles in this particular portion of your mid section
